long_description: At only 2 lbs. 12 oz., the Therm-a-Rest LuxuryLite(R) UltraLite Cot(TM) opens up new opportunities for comfort in the outdoors. Take it backpacking, bike touring or kayaking. Regular-size cot weighs only 2 lbs. 12 oz., making it light enough to take on backpacking trips; large size weighs 3 lbs. 2 oz. Cot packs down to 6 x 15 in. to fit easily in bicycle panniers, portage bags and backpacks; large size packs down to 5 x 17 in. BowFrame(TM) patented technology eliminates painful crossbars, squeaky joints and broken hardware that can be found on other cots. Laminated nylon cover is waterproof and won't stretch. Anodized aluminum poles and durable nylon feet stand up to heavy use. The Therm-a-Rest LuxuryLite UltraLite cot assembles in only 3 min. and does not require any tools; includes a small stuff sack.
short_description: At only 2 lbs. 12 oz., the Therm-a-Rest LuxuryLite(R) UltraLite Cot(TM) opens up new opportunities for comfort in the outdoors. Take it backpacking, bike touring or kayaking.
